pages.text: After finding the necessary amounts of Chromatic Iron, clusters of Vault Stone can be found $(l)below Y: -5$().$(br2)When mining Vault Stone, there is a 10% chance for it to drop a $(l)Chipped Vault Rock$().
Combining $(l)Chipped Vault Rocks$() with $(l)Chromatic Iron$() in a Crafting Table results in a $(l)Vault Rock$().
